   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to BSG's documentation!
===============================

The BSG library is a C++ program designed to calculate the allowed beta spectrum shape coming from nuclear beta decay to high precision.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   intro
